subject: Ski Jumping
Skiing
Deaths (Obituaries)
Olympic Games
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: Mr. Raska became the first Czech to win a gold medal at the Winter Olympics when he prevailed in Grenoble, France, in 1968.
snippet: Mr. Raska became the first Czech to win a gold medal at the Winter Olympics when he prevailed in Grenoble, France, in 1968.
